article.headline: Bank of America Corp. stock rises Friday, still underperforms market
article.body: Shares of Bank of America Corp. BAC, +0.47% inched 0.48% higher to $25.36 Friday, on what proved to be an all-around favorable trading session for the stock market, with the S&P 500 Index SPX, +0.87% rising 0.88% to 3,477.14 and the Dow Jones Industrial Average DJIA, +0.56% rising 0.57% to 28,586.90. This was the stock's third consecutive day of gains. Bank of America Corp. closed $10.36 below its 52-week high ($35.72), which the company reached on December 27th. The stock outperformed some of its competitors Friday, as JPMorgan Chase & Co. JPM, -0.57% fell 0.57% to $101.20, Wells Fargo & Co. WFC, remained unchanged, and Citigroup Inc. C, +0.47% rose 0.47% to $44.93. Trading volume (44.3 M) remained 11.9 million below its 50-day average volume of 56.1 M.
